subject: p12658295
History: Left VATS decortication and recent right effusion, status post thoracentesis.
Findings: In comparison with study of, there has been reaccumulation of pleural fluid at the right base with underlying compressive atelectasis following apparent thoracentesis. No evidence of pneumothorax. The remainder of the heart and lungs are unchanged.
